disclaimer_start: Disclaimer: The following architectural design is for informational purposes only. For any structural, legal, or safety concerns, please consult a certified architect or relevant professional authorities.

rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A grand north-facing entrance hall welcoming guests. Includes a vestibule with ample space for storage and reception.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room adjacent to the entrance hall, designed with traditional Kerala motifs. Features a central seating area and large windows.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: An elegant dining space adjacent to the living room; ample natural lighting from east-facing windows. Suitable for hosting gatherings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen with modern amenities integrated into traditional design elements.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom located in a quiet area. Includes attached en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: North-facing entrance door ensuring auspicious entry. Designed with traditional Kerala wooden carvings and glass accents.

openings.name: Window Set 1
openings.description: Large windows in the living room to enhance natural light. Eastern exposure is maintained.

openings.name: Window Set 2
openings.description: Multiple openings in the dining area for ventilation and view, primarily south-eastern.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: A transitional space from living room to rooftop terrace providing open views.

disclaimer_end: Disclaimer: This design is a conceptual model. Final designs should be reviewed by licensed professionals and must comply with all applicable local building codes and regulations.
